title: Reengineering challenge: The leader as detective
items.abstract: <jats:p>Executives leading reengineering efforts should consider novel role models—such as that of detective. The author suggests that CEOs could take lessons from Raymond Chandler's famous fictional private eye, Philip Marlowe.</jats:p>

title: Reengineering: Business Change of Mythic Proportions?
Le reengineering, Michael Hammer et James Champy
Reengineering for simplicity and flexibility at siemens solar industries
items.abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>Simplicity and flexibility are goals that everyone should consider when reengineering a process. They were essential to productivity and quality improvements at Siemens Solar Industries. This case study describes how Siemens combined creativity and some fundamental manufacturing principles in successfully reengineering its circuit assembly process.</jats:p>
